Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4676.
_description: Gospel for Thirteenth Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte luke þe gospellere saise vsþat till his dissiples
                    saide iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…And ȝe will list to me & litheffor all sinful it mai
                    make blithe
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO his disciples seide cristAs seiþ seint luc þe
                    Ewangelyst…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And hose wol listen wel þis taleHe may haue bote of
                    muche bale
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Beati oculi qui vident quod uos in debitum (f.
                    203rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
TO his disciples seide cristAs seiþ seint luc þe
                    Euangelist…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And who so wol listen wel þis taleHe may haue bote of
                    muche bale
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Beati oculi qui uident quod uos in (f. 8rb)

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint luke þe gospeller sais vsThat till his disciples said
                    Ihesus…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…And ȝe will listen to me & litheffor all synfull it
                    may make blithe

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Tyll hys disiples sayde crysteAls says luke þe
                    euangelysteþa eghen he sayde blyssede be…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…and wha sa lystynes wele þis taleyt may be bowte of
                    mykyll bayll

HunHM129.First Lines:
To his disciplis said cristAs seith seint Luc þe
                    wangelist…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And who so lystyth well þis taleHe may be bet off moche
                    bale
HunHM129.Attributed Title:
Dominica tercia decima post festum trinitatis (f.
                    137v)
